translations: adj.衷心的，诚挚的；（人）真诚的，诚恳的

sentences.sentence: He seemed sincere enough when he said he wanted to help.
sentences.translation: 他表示愿意帮忙，样子很真诚。

sentences.sentence: He had a way of sounding so sincere. It made me warm and tingly.
sentences.translation: 他的话听起来如此真诚。这让我觉得温暖而舒心。

sentences.sentence: Primo de Rivera himself was a benevolent and sincere paternalist.
sentences.translation: 普里莫·德里韦拉本人是个仁慈而真诚的家长式人物。
